info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 4:28PM EDT until May 06 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Burke County in east central Georgia... Southern Barnwell County in central South Carolina... South central Aiken County in central South Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 427 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Alexander, or 10 miles southwest of Plant Vogtle, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Barnwell, Savannah River Site, Plant Vogtle, Sardis, Alexander, Burke County Airport, Snelling, Kline, Girard, Di- Lane Wildlife Management Area, Savannah River Site H Canyon, Savannah River Site K Complex and Shell Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
